name: Battle Snake
description: Developed a web-based coding platform using React and Sass, designed for students with instructor tools that simplified assignment management and improved workflow.

name: Battle Snake APIs
description: Developed Node.js microservice APIs for OAuth, file handling, VM deployment, and web proxy. Deployed as containerized apps on Docker and Fly.io.

name: Assignment Upload
description: Documented process diagrams as part of system analysis during the Battle Snake project, aligning requirements with design decisions and identifying dependencies early in development.

name: Hextris Website
description: Built node.js website using express and pug view engine. Integrated with AWS sdk to enable AWS authentication and database access.

name: Hextris Game
description: Added features to a public-license JavaScript game, including login, authentication, score lookup, and high-score updates. Integrated AWS libraries and implemented API calls through custom JavaScript code.

name: Hextris Architecture
description: Implemented AWS cloud services to handle authentication, score tracking, and player ranking, using Lambda functions with APIs, Cognito, EC2, and automated backups.

name: Marquee
description: A JavaScript game that combined vertical shooter and rhythm mechanics. Built as a foundation project to develop core JavaScript skils.

name: Bluetooth Keyboard
description: An Android application built with Kotlin, leveraging MVVM architecture, LiveData, and Coroutines. The app functions as a Bluetooth keyboard, touchpad, media controller, and game controller, designed to provide a seamless multi-purpose control experience across devices.

name: MVC Notes
description: Developed a study note for the .NET MVC course as part of a documentation exercise. The material was shared with cohorts to support collaborative learning and reinforce course concepts.

name: Installation Guide
description: Authored the installation guide for a group website project, detailing step-by-step instructions for setup, configuration, and deployment to ensure easy installation and usability for team members and future users.

name: Machine Tag - User Manual
description: Created a comprehensive user manual for the Machine Tagging Automation project delivered to a client. The documentation guided end-users through setup, operation, and troubleshooting, ensuring smooth adoption of the system.

name: Machine Tag
description: Created a detailed design document for the Automated Machine Tagging software, including diagrams, feature specifications, and workflows. The document served as a reference for developers and end-users, ensuring clarity during implementation and smooth adoption by the client.

name: AI Wardrobe DB
description: Built and maintained a PostgreSQL database for a group website project, including schema design, query optimization, patch updates, implementation scripts, and data seeding scripts.
